Software Engineering Playbook
  1. Operational Excellence
  2. Guilds

Guilds

Guilds are formed around “community of interest”, a group of people that want to share knowledge, tools, code, and practices. Guilds should be seen as semi-permanent with assigned leaders who manage the health of the Guild.
